Command *netstat*
******************

Documentation for the netstat command in */cmds/wiz/netstat.c*.

Command
=======

See: `Command: socketinfo <socketinfo.html>`_ 

USAGE: ``netstat``

Displays a list of sockets with (stat) info on each one.
